author: Philip Khoo
title: Visual communication for community
description: Information about Project Catalyst is difficult to digest for many. There is minimal good visual resources to explain complex concepts.
solution: Create visual resources to continue the series of info graphics that visually describe Project Catalyst from Fund 3.
experience: Community advisor from fund 3. Fund 4 proposal Infographic Series 1 https://bit.ly/3dVhfhV, Community Landing Page https://cardanocataly.st/
